description:
Cyan is a .NET dynamic client for the Azure Table Storage REST API.

Uses .NET 4 dynamic features to mimic the behavior of the REST API so that you can leverage the existing Azure documentation without being forced to have a complex object model.
releaseNotes:
Most of the code is well tested and pretty much stable.
Entity Group Transactions are alpha even if usable and partially tested.

Changes for this release: support for almost all features of the table service, support for Entity Group Transactions (alpha), new patterns that simplify common tasks (such as batch inserting, empty table etc...), improved object model, helper method to create the client from a connection string, support for Development Storage (still with some bugs), fixed a ton of small bugs
summary: Cyan is a .NET dynamic client for the Azure Table Storage REST API built with KISS principle in mind.
title: Cyan - Simpler than Azure
